Adriana Rimpel, ónyé a maara dịka Lady Midnight, bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-agụ egwú, onye na'ede egwu, ónyé nkụzi na ónyé isi ọbọdọ nke dị na Minneapolis, Minnesota.

Paul's West Side na Minnesota. Nna ya bụ ónyé na-akụ ọkpọ na nné ya bụ ónyé ọbụ abụ na otu salsa mbụ nke Minnesota, Sabroson. Ọ bụ ónyé na-arụ ọrụ na Donat Believe the Hype, mmemme telivishọn na Twin Cities 'PBS nke ndị ntorobịa POC mepụtara nke nyéré ndị na-eto eto ike ịmepụta ihe. O nwere Bachelor of Fine Arts na Photography site na Minneapolis College of Art and Design ma mụọ Studio Dance ihe karịrị afọ 12. Rimpel bụ asụsụ abụọ ma bụrụ ónyé Afro-Indigenous, Mexican, Haitian, na Aztec.
Rimpel nwèrè nzụlite na egwu Afro-Cuban, hip-hop, pop, R&B, na egwu nnwale

Ọ malitere ime egwu dị ka ónyé na-agụ egwú na otu Afro-Cubana nke Minneapolis bụ Malamanya n'afọ 2000. Ọ nọrọ na Malamanya ruo afọ anọ ma soro ha rụọ ọrụ dị ka akụkụ nke The Lowertown Line, ndekọ na ajụjụ ọnụ nke TPT Twin Cities PBS. Ọ bụkwa ónyé otu VANDAAM nke ọbọdọ abụọ ahụ. N'afọ 2016, ya na Afrokeys wepụtara egwu ise nke EP n'okpuru aha Parables of Neptune nke gụnyere egwu "Wax Line".

A kpọrọ Rimpel otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe nkírí The Local Show to Watch na 2016. A kpọrọ ya Best Twin Cities Vocalist nke 2017 site na City Pages, na # 3 Họrọ ka ọ pịa na 2017 site na Town Pages. Abọm ya, Death Before Mourning, meriri Best Album site na City Pages' Best of the Twin Cities 2020.
